verses.padam: - Padam naH| samanasAqviti̍ sa - manasau| samOkasAqviti̍ saM - Okasau| arEpasau̱| | mA| yajñam| hiṃqsiśhTam| mA| yajñapatimiti̍# yajña - patim| jAqtavEdasAqviti# jAta - vEdasau| śivau| Bavatam| adya| naH| | agnau| agniH| carati| praviśhTa̍ iti pra - viśhTaH| RuśhIṇAm|̍ putraH| adhirAqja ityadhi̍ - rAqjaH| EśhaH| | svAqhAqkRutyEti# svAhA - kRutya|̍ brahmaṇA|̍ tE| juhOmi| mA| dEvAnA̱m| mithuyA| kaH| BAqgadhEyamiti# BAga - dhEya̱m| | 13 (31) (Bavata̍ - mEkatriṃśacca)̍ (A7)
verses.samhita: naH samanasau̍ samOkasAvarEpasau̱|̍ mA yajñaṃ hiṃsiśhTaM̍ mA yajñapatiM̍ jAtavEdasau śivau Bavatamadya̍ naH|̍ | agnAvagniścarati̍ praviśhTa̍ RuśhIṇAM̍ putrO adhirAqja̍ EśhaH| svAqhAqkRutya brahmaṇA̍ tE juhOmi mA dEvAnA̱M mithuyA karBAgadhEya̱M|̍ | 13 (Bavata-mEka̍triṃśacca)̍ (A7)

verses.padam: - Padam Eti|̍ dadE| Rutasya|̍ tvAq| dEvahaviriti# dEva - haviH| pAśEna|̍ Eti|̍ raBE| dhaṛ śha|̍ mAnuśhAn|̍ adBya ityat̍ - ByaH| tvAq| OśhadhIBya̍ ityOśhadhi̍ - ByaH| prEti|̍ ukśhAqmi| apAm| pEruH| asi| svAqttam| cit| sadEvamiti̍ sa - dEvam| havyam| ApaH|̍ dEvIH| svadata|̍ Enam| samiti|̍ tE| prAqṇa iti# pra - anaH| vAqyunA̱| gacCatAqm| samiti|̍ yajatraiH|̍ a~ggAni|̍ samiti|̍ yajñapatiriti̍# yajña - patiH| AqśiśhEtyA̱ - śiśhA̱| GRutEna|̍ aktau| paśum| trAqyEthAqm| rEvatIH|̍ yajñapatimiti̍# yajña - patim| priyadhEti# priya - dhA| Eti|̍ viśata| urO iti|̍ antarikśha| sajUriti# sa - jUH| dEvEna|̍ 14 (50)
verses.samhita: A dada̍ Rutasya# tvA dEvahaviH pAśEnA&&raBE̍ dhaṛ śhAq mAnuśhAnadByastvauśha̍dhIByaH̍ prOkśhA̱myapAM pErurasi̍ svAqttaM cith sadEvaṃ̍ havyamApO# dEvIH svadatainaṃq̍ saM tE̱ prAqṇO vAqyunA# gacCatAqṃq saM ~Myajatraira~ggA̍ni̍ saM ~MyajñapatirAqśiśhA̍# GRutEnAqktau paśuM trAyEthAqṃq̍ rEvatIr̍ yajñapatiM̍ priyadhA&&* viśatOrO̍# antarikśha sajUr dEvEna - [ ] 14

verses.padam: - Padam vAtEna|̍ asya| haviśhaH|̍ tmanA̱| yaja| samiti|̍ asya| tanuvA̱| Bava| vaṛ śhIyaH|̍ vaṛ śhIyasi|̍ yajñE| yajñapatimiti̍# yajña - patim| dhAqH| pRuthivyAH| sampRuca iti# sam - pRucaH|̍ pAqhi| namaH|̍ tE| AqtAqnEtyA̱ - tAqna| anarvA| prEti|̍ ihi| GRutasya|̍ kuqlyAm| anviti|̍ saha| prajayEti# pra - jayA̱| saha| rAqyaH| pOśhEṇa|̍ ApaH|̍ dEvIH| śuddhAqyuva iti# śuddha - yuvaH| śuddhAH| yUyam| dEvAn| UDhvam| śuddhAH| vayam| pariviśhTAq̍ iti pari# - viśhTAqH| parivEśhTAra iti# pari - vEśhTAraH|̍ vaH| BUyAqsma| | 15 (44) (dEvana - catuścatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A8)
verses.samhita: vAtEnAqsya̍ haviśhastmanA# yaja samasya̍ tanuvA# Bava vaṛ śhIyO̍ vaṛ śhIyasi̍ yajñE yajñapatiM̍ dhAH pRuthivyAH̍ saMpRucaH̍ pAhi namasta̍ AtAnA&narvA prEhi# GRutasya# kuqlyAmanu# saha prajayA# saha rAqyaspOśhEṇA &&pO# dEvIH śuddhAyuvaH śuddhA yUyaM dEvAṃ U̱Dhvaṃ śuddhA vayaM pariviśhTAH̍ parivEśhTArO# vO BUyAsma| | 15 (dEvana-catuścatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A8)

verses.padam: - Padam vAk| tE| Eti|̍ pyAqyatAqm| prAqṇa iti# pra - anaH| tE| Eti|̍ pyAqyatAqm| cakśhuH|̍ tE| Eti|̍ pyAqyatAqm| śrOtra̱m| tE| Eti|̍ pyAqyatAqm| yA| tE| prAqṇAniti# pra - anAn| śuk| jagAma|̍ yA| cakśhuH|̍ yA| śrOtra̱m| yat| tE| krUram| yat| AsthitamityA̍ - sthitam| tat| tE| Eti|̍ pyAqyatAqm| tat| tE| EtEna|̍ śundhatAqm| nABiH|̍ tE| Eti|̍ pyAqyatAqm| pAqyuH| tE| Eti|̍ pyAqyatAqm| śuddhAH| caritrA̱H| śam| adBya ityat̍ - ByaH| 16 (50)
verses.samhita: vAkta A pyAyatAM̍ prAqṇasta A pyAyatAqM̍ cakśhusta̍ A pyAyatAqṅq̍ śrOtraM̍ ta A pyAyatAqM̍ ~MyA tE̱ prAqṇA~jCugjagAma yA cakśhuryA śrOtraM ~MyattE̱ krUraM ~MyadAsthitaM̍ tatta A pyAyatAqM̍ tatta# EtEna# śundhatAqM nABista̍ A pyAyatAM̍ pAqyusta A pyAyatAṃ̍ śuddhAścaritrAqH śamadByaH - [ ] 16

verses.padam: - Padam śam| OśhadhIBya̍ ityOśhAdha̍ - ByaH| śam| pRuthivyai| śam| ahO̱ByAqmityahaH̍ - ByAqm| OśhadhE|̍ trAyasva|̍ Enam| svadhita̍ iti sva - dhitE| mA| Enam| hiṃqsIH| rakśhasAm|̍ BAqgaH| asi| idam| aham| rakśhaH|̍ adhamam| tamaH|̍ nayAqmi| yaH| asmAn| dvEśhTi|̍ yam| ca| vayam| dviśhmaH| idam| Enam| adhamam| tamaH|̍ nayAqmi| iśhE| tvAq| GRutEna|̍ dyAqvAqpRuthivI iti# dyAvA - pRuthivI| prEti|̍ UrṇvAqthAqm| acCinnaH|̍ rAyaH|̍ suvIra iti# su - vIraH|̍ uru| antarikśham|̍ anviti|̍ ihi| vAyO iti|̍ vIti|̍ ihi ( )| stOkAnA̱m| svAhA̱| UrddhvanaBasamityUrddhva̍ - naBasam| mAqrutam| gacCatam| | 17 (55)
verses.samhita: śamOśhadhIByaH̍ śaM pRuthivyai̍ śamahO̱ByAq-mOśhadhE̍ trAyasvainaṅq̍ svadhitE̍ mainaṃ# hiṃsI rakśhasAM̍ BAqgO&sIdamahaṃ̍ rakśhO&dhamaM̍ tamO# nayAmi yO̱&smAn dvEśhTi yaM ca# vayaM dviśhma idamEnamadhamaM̍ tamO# nayAmIśhE tvA# GRutEna# dyAvApRuthivI prOrṇvAthAq-macCi̍nnO̍ rAyaH̍ suvIra# urvantari̍kśhamanvi̍hi̍ vAyO vIhi# ( ) stOkAnAqṅq svAhOrddhvanaBasaM̍ mArutaM gacCataM|̍ | 17

verses.padam: - Padam samiti|̍ tE| manasA|̍ manaH|̍ samiti|̍ prAqṇEnEti# pra - anEna|̍ prAqṇa iti# pra - anaH| juśhTa̱m| dEvEByaH|̍ havyam| GRutavaditi# GRuta - vat| svAhA̱| aindraH| prAqṇa iti# pra - anaH| a~ggEa~gga̍ itya~ggE̱ - a~ggE| nIti|̍ dEddhyat| aindraH| apAqna ityapa̍ - anaH| a~ggEa~gga̍ itya~ggE̱ - a~ggE| vIti|̍ bOBuvat| dEva|̍ tvaśhTaH| BUri|̍ tE| saṃsamiti saM - sam| Etu| viśhurUpAq̍ iti viśhu# - rUpAqH| yat| salakśhmAṇa̍ iti sa - lakśhmAqṇaH| Bavatha|̍ dEvatrEti# dEva - trA| yanta̱m| avasE|̍ saKAyaH|̍ anviti|̍ tvAq| mAqtA| pitaraH|̍ madantu| śrIH| asI| agniH| tvAq| śrIṇAqtu| ApaH|̍ samiti|̍ ariṇann| vAtasya|̍ 18 (50)
verses.samhita: saM tE manasAq̍ manaHq saM prAqṇEna# prAqṇO juśhTaM̍ dEvEByO# havyaM GRutavath svAhaindraH prAqṇO a~ggEa~ggE̍ ni dE̱ddhyadaindrO# &pAqnO a~ggEa~ggE̍ vi bOBuvaddEva̍# tvaśhTarBUri# tE saṃsamEtu̍ viśhurUpAq̍ yath salakśhmAṇO̍ Bavatha̍ dEvatrA yantamavasE̍ saKAqyO&nu# tvA mAqtA pitarO# madantu śrIrasyagnistvA̱̍ śrIṇAqtvApaH samariṇan̍ vAtasya-[̍ ] 18

verses.padam: - Padam tvAq| dhrajyai̱| pUśhṇaH| raṅhyai̱| apAm| OśhadhInAm|̍ rOhiśhyai|̍ GRutam| GRutapAqvAqna iti# GRuta - pAqvAqnaH| pibata| vasA̱m| vasAqpAqvAqna iti# vasA - pAqvAqnaH| pibata| antarikśhasya|̍ haviH| asi| svAhA̱| tvAq| antarikśhAya|̍ diśaH|̍ pradiśa iti# pra - diśaH|̍ Aqdiśa ityA̱ - diśaH|̍ vidiśa iti# vi - diśaH|̍ uddiśa ityut̍ - diśaH|̍ svAhA̱| digBya iti# dik - ByaH| namaH|̍ digBya iti# dik - ByaH| | 19 (28) (vAtasyAq̍ - śhTAviṃśatiśca)̍ (A10)
verses.samhita: tvAq dhrajyai# pUśhṇO raṅhyA# apAmOśhadhInAqṃq̍ rOhiśhyai̍ GRutaM GRutapAvAnaH̍ pibata vasA̱M ~MvasApAvAnaH pibatAq&ntarikśhasya̍ havirasi̍ svAhA̱ tvAq&ntarikśhAya̍ diśaH̍ pradiśa# AqdiśO# vidiśa# uddiśaH svAhA# digByO namO# digByaH| | 19 (vAtasyAq-śhTAviṃ̍śatiśca)̍ (A10)

verses.padam: - Padam samudram| gacCa| svAhA̱| antarikśham|̍ gacCa| svAhA̱| dEvam| savitAra̱m| gacCa| svAhA̱| ahOrAqtrE ityahaH̍ - rAqtrE| gacCa| svAhA̱| mitrAvaruṇAqviti̍# mitrA - varuṇau|̍ gacCa| svAhA̱| sOma̱m| gacCa| svAhA̱| yajñam| gacCa| svAhA̱| CandAṃsi|̍ gacCa| svAhA̱| dyAvApRuthivI̍ iti dyAvA̱ - pRuthivI| gacCa| svAhA̱| naBaH|̍ divyam| gacCa| svAhA̱| agnim| vaiśvAqnaram| gacCa| svAhA̱| adBya ityat̍ - ByaH| tvAq| OśhadhIBya̍ ityOśhadhi̍ - ByaH| manaH|̍ mE| hArdi|̍ yacCa| tanUm| tvaca̱m| putram| naptAram|̍ aśIya| śuk| asi ( )| tam| aBIti|̍ śOca| yaH| asmAn| dvEśhTi|̍ yam| ca| vayam| dviśhmaH| dhAmnO# dhAmna iti dhAmnaH̍ - dhAqmnaH| rAqjann| itaH| varuṇa| naH| mu~jca| yat| ApaH|̍ aGniyAH|̍ varuṇa|̍ iti|̍ śapAmahE|̍ tataH|̍ varuṇa| naH| mu~jca| | 20 (76) (asi - śhaDviṃśatiśca̍ )(A11)
verses.samhita: samudraM gacCa̍ svAhAq&ntarikśhaM̍ gacCa svAhA# dEvaṃ savitAra̍M̍ gacCa svAhA&hOrAqtrE̍ gacCa̍ svAhA# mitrAvaruṇau̍ gacCa svAhAq sOmaM̍ gacCa svAhA# yajñaM gacCa̍ svAhAq CandAṃsi̍ gacCa svAhAq dyAvApRuthivI̍ gacCa̍ svAhAq naBO# divyaM gacCa̍ svAhAq&gniM ~Mvai̱śvAnaraM gacCa̍ svAhAq&dByastvauśhadhIByO̍ manO# mE hArdi# yacCa tanUM tvacaM̍ putraM naptAramaśIya̍ śugasi̍ ( ) tamaBi śOca̍ yO̱&smAn dvEśhTi yaM ca# vayaM dviśhmO dhAmnOdhAmnO̍ rAjannitO varuṇa̍ nO mu~jca yadApO aGniyAq̍ varuṇEti śapAmahE̍ tatO# varuṇa nO mu~jca| | 20 (asi-śhaDviṃśatiśca̍ ) (A11)

verses.padam: - Padam haviśhmatIH|̍ imAH| ApaH|̍ haviśhmAn|̍ dEvaH| addhvaraH| haviśhmAn|̍ Eti|̍ vivAqsati| haviśhmAn|̍ astu| sUryaH|̍ | agnEH| vaH| apannagRuhasyEtyapa̍nna̍ - gRuhasya| sadasi|̍ sAqdayAqmi| sumnAya|̍ sumninIH| sumnE| mAq| dhatta| indrAqgniyOritI̱ndra - agniyOH| BAqgadhEyIriti# BAga - dhEyI̱H| stha| mitrAvaruṇayOriti̍# mitrA - varuṇayOH|̍ BAqgadhEyIriti# BAga - dhEyI̱H| stha| viśvEśhAm|̍ dEvAnA̱m| BAqgadhEyIriti# BAga - dhEyI̱H| stha| yajñE| jAqgRuta| | 21 (34) (haviśhmatI̍ - ścatustriṃśat)̍ (A12)
verses.samhita: haviśhmatIrimA̍ ApO# haviśhmA̱n dEvO addhvarO̍ haviśhmAqṃq A vivAsati̍ haviśhmAṃ# astu sUryaH|̍ | agnErvO &pannagRuhasya̍ sadasi̍ sAdayAmi sumnAya# sumninIH sumnE mA# dhattEndrAgniyOr BAgadhEyI̱H̍ stha mitrAvaruṇayOr̍ BAgadhEyI̱H stha viśvEśhAM̍ dEvAnA̱M BAgadhEyI̱H stha yajñE jAgRuta|̍ | 21 (haviśhmatI-ścatu̍striṃśat)̍ (A12)

verses.padam: - Padam hRudE| tvAq| manasE|̍ tvAq| divE| tvAq| sUryAya|̍ tvAq| Urddhvam| imam| addhvaram| kRudhi| divi| dEvEśhu|̍ hOtrA̱H| yacCa| sOma|̍ rAqjann| Eti|̍ ihi| avEti|̍ rOha| mA| BEH| mA| samiti|̍ vikthAqH| mA| tvAq| hiṃqsiśham| prajA iti# pra - jAH| tvam| upAvarOhEtyu̍pa̍ - avarOha|̍ prajA iti# pra - jAH| tvAm| upAvarOhantvityu̍pa̍ - avarOhantu|̍ śRuṇOtu|̍ agniH| samidhEti# sam - idhA̱| hava̱m| mE| śRuṇvantu|̍ ApaH|̍ dhiśhaṇA̱H| ca| dEvIH| | śRuṇOta|̍ grAqvAqṇaH| viduśhaH|̍ nu| 22 (50)
verses.samhita: hRudE tvAq manasE̍ tvA divE tvAq sUryAya̍ tvOrddhvamimamaddhvaraM̍ kRudhi̍ divi dEvEśhu hOtrA# yacCa sOma# rAjannEhyava# rOha mA BErmA saM ~MvikthAq̍ mA tvA# hiṃsiśhaM prajAstvamupAvarOha̍ prajAstvAmupAvarOhantu̍ śRuṇOtvagniH samidhAq havaM̍ mE śRuṇvantvApO# dhiśhaṇA̱śca dEvIH| śRuṇOta# grAvAṇO viduśhO nu - [ ] 22

verses.padam: - Padam yajñam| śRuṇOtu|̍ dEvaH| savitA| hava̱m| mE| | dEvI̱H| AqpaH| apAqm| napAqt| yaH| UrmiH| haviśhyaH|̍ indriyAvAqnitI̱ndriya - vAqn| madintamaH|̍ tam| dEvEByaH|̍ dEvatrEti# dEva - trA| dhatta| śukram| śukrapEBya iti# śukra - pEByaH|̍ yEśhA̱m| BAqgaH| stha| svAhA̱| kAṛ śhiH|̍ asi| apEti|̍ apAm| mRuddhram| samudrasya|̍ vaH| akśhityai|̍ uditi|̍ nayE| | yam| agnE| pRuthsviti# pRut - su| martya̱m| AvaH|̍ vAjEśhu|̍ yam| junAH| | saH| yantA̱| śaśvatIH|̍ iśhaH|̍ | 23 (47) (nu - saptacatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A13)
verses.samhita: yajñaṃ śRuṇOtu# dEvaH savitA̍ havaM̍ mE| dEvIrApO̍ apAM napAqdya Urmirhaviśhya̍# indriyAvA̱n madintamastaM̍ dEvEByO# dEvatrA dhatta̍ śukraṃ śukrapEByO̍ yEśhA̱M BAqgaH stha svAhAq kAṛ śhirasyapAq&pAM̍ mRuddhraṃ samudrasya̍ vO&kśhityAq̍ unnayE|̍ yamagnE̍ pRuthsu martyamAvO vAjEśhu̍ yaM junAH| sa yantAq śaśvatIriśha̍H|̍ | 23 ( nu-saptacatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A13)

verses.padam: - Padam tvam| agnE| rudraH| asuraH|̍ mahaH| divaH| tvam| śardhaH|̍ mArutam|̍ pRukśhaH| IśiśhE| | tvam| vAtai̱H| aruṇaiH| yAqsi| śa~ggaya iti# śaM - gayaH| tvam| pUśhA| vidhata iti# vi - dhataH| pAqsi| nu| tmanA̱| | Eti|̍ vaH| rAjAnam|̍ addhvarasya|̍ rudram| hOtAram|̍ satyayajamiti# satya - yaja̱m| rOdasyOH|̍ | agnim| purA| tanayitnOH| acittA̱t| hiraṇyarUpamiti̍ hiraṇya̍ - rUpam| avasE|̍ kRuṇuddhvam| | agniH| hOtA̱| nIti|̍ sasAqda| yajIyAn|̍ upastha ityupa - sthE| mAqtuH| suraBau| u| lOkE| | yuvA̱| kaviH| puruniśhTha iti# puru - niśhThaH| 24 (50)
verses.samhita: tvamagnE̍ rudrO asurO̍ mahO divastvaṃ śarddhO mArutaM̍ pRukśha IśiśhE|̍ tvaM ~MvAtairaruṇairyA̍si̍ śaMgayastvaM pUśhA vidhataH̍ pAsi̍ nutmanA̱| | A vO rAjAnamaddhvarasya̍# rudraṃ hOtAraṃ̍ satyayajaṃq rOdasyOH|̍ agniM purA tanayitnO̍ racittAqddhiraṇyarUpamava̍sE̍ kRuṇuddhvaM| | agniṛ hOtAq ni śhasAdAq̍ yajIyAnupasthE̍# mAqtuH suraBAvu̍# lOkE| yuvA# kaviH puruniśhTha̍ - [ ] 24

verses.padam: - Padam RutAvEtyRutA - vAq| dhartA| kRuśhTInAm| uta| maddhyE̱| iddhaH| | sAqddhvIm| akaH| dEvavItimiti̍# dEva - vItim| naH| adya| yajñasya|̍ jihvAm| avidAqma| guhyA̱m| | saH| AyuH|̍ Eti|̍ agAqt| suraBiH| vasAnaH|̍ BadrAm| akaH| dEvahUtimiti̍# dEva - hUtim| naH| adya| | akrandat|̍ agniH| stanayann|̍ iva| dyauH| kśhAma|̍ rErihat|̍ vIrudhaH|̍ sama~jjanniti# saM - a~jjann| | sadyaH| jajñAqnaH| vIti|̍ hi| Im| iddhaH| aKyat|̍ Eti|̍ rOdasI̍ iti|̍ BAqnunA̱| BAqti| antaH| | tvE iti|̍ vasUni|̍ purvaṇIkEti# puru - anIka| 25 (50)
verses.samhita: RutAvA# dhartA kRuśhTInAmuta̍ maddhya# iddhaH| | sAqddhvImakar̍ dEvavItiM̍ nO adya yajñasya# jihvAmavidAma̍ guhyA̱M| sa AyurA&gA̱th suraBirvasAnO̍ BadrAmakar̍ dEvahUtiM̍ nO adya| | akrandadagniH̍ stanayanniva̍ dyauH kśhAmAq rErihadvIrudha̍H̍ sama~jjann| sadyO jajñAqnO̍ vi hImiddhO aKyadA rOdasI̍ BAqnunA# BAtyantaH| | tvE vasUni̍ purvaṇIka-[ ] 25

verses.padam: - Padam hOtaH| dOśhA| vastO̱H| Eti|̍ IrirE| yajñiyAsaH|̍ | kśhAma|̍ iva| viśvA̱| BuvanAni|̍ yasminn|̍ samiti|̍ sauBagAni|̍ dadhirE| pAqvakE| | tuBya̱m| tAH| a~ggirastamEtya~ggiraH̍ - tama| viśvA̱H| sukśhitaya iti# su - kśhitayaH|̍ pRuthak|̍ | agnE̱| kAmAya|̍ yEmirE| | aśyAma|̍ tam| kAma̱m| agnE| tava|̍ UtI| aśyAma|̍ rayim| rayiva iti# rayi - vaH| suvIramiti# su - vIra̱m| | aśyAma|̍ vAja̱m| aBIti|̍ vAqjayantaH|̍ aśyAma|̍ dyumnam| ajara| ajara̱m| tE| | śrEśhTha̱m| yaviśhTha| BAqrata| agnE̱| dyumantamiti# dyu - manta̱m| Eti|̍ Bara| | 26 (50)
verses.samhita: hOtardOśhA vastOrErirE̍ yajñiyAsaH|̍ kśhAmEva̍ viśvAq BuvanAni̍ yasminth saṃ sauBagAni̍ dadhirE pAvakE|̍ | tuByaM tA a~ggirastama̍ viśvA̱H sukśhitayaH pRuthak|̍ agnE kAmAya̍ yEmirE| | aśyAma taM kAmamagnE̍ tavOtyaśyAma̍# rayiṃ rayivaH̍ suvIra̱M| aśyAma vAjamaBi̍ vAqjayantO̍ &śyAma# dyumnamajarAqjara̍M̍ tE| | śrEśhThaM̍ ~MyaviśhTha BAratAgnE̱ dyumantamA Bara|̍ 26

verses.padam: - Padam vasO iti|̍ puruspRuhamiti# puru - spRuha̱m| rayim| | saH| śvitAqnaH| tanyatuH| rOcanasthA iti# rOcana - sthAH| ajarEBiH|̍ nAnadadBiriti̍ nAnadat̍ - BiH| yaviśhThaH|̍ | yaH| pAqvakaH| purutama iti# puru - tamaH|̍ purUṇi|̍ pRuthUni|̍ agniH| anuyAtItyanu̍ - yAti|̍ Barvann|̍ | AyuH|̍ tE| viśvataH|̍ dadhat| ayam| agniH| vara̱ṇyaH| | punaH|̍ tE| prAqṇa iti# pra - anaH| Eti|̍ ayati| parEti|̍ yakśhma̱m| suvAqmi| tE| | AqyurdA ityAyuH̍ - dAH| agnE| haviśhaH|̍ juśhAqṇaH| GRutapratIka̍ iti# GRuta - pratIkaH| GRutayOniriti̍# GRuta - yOniH| Edhi| | GRutam| pItvA| madhu|̍ cAru|̍ gavya̱m| pitA| iva| putram| aBIti|̍ 27 (50)
verses.samhita: vasO# puruspRuhaṃ# rayiM| | sa śvitAqnasta̍nyatU̍ rOcanasthA̍ ajarEBir̍ nAnadadBiryavi̍śhThaH|̍ yaH pAvakaH̍ purutama̍H̍ purUṇi# pRuthUnyagniranuyAti̍ Barvann|̍ | AyuśhTE̍ viśvatO# dadhadayamagnir varE̱ṇyaH| punastE̍ prAqṇa A&yati̍ parAq yakśhmaṃ# suvAmi tE| | AqyurdA agnE̍ haviśhO# juśhAqṇO GRutapratIkO̍ GRutayOnirEdhi|̍ GRutaM pItvA madhu cAru gavyaM̍ pitEva# putramaBi - [ ] 27

verses.padam: - Padam rakśhatAqt| imam| | tasmai̱| tE| pratiharyata̍ iti# prati - haryatE|̍ jAtavEda̍ iti jAta# - vEdaH| vicaṛ̍ śhaṇa iti vi - carq. śhaṇE| | agnE̱| janAmi|̍ suśhTutimiti# su - stutim| | divaH| parIti|̍ prathamam| jajñE| agniH| asmat| dvitIya̱m| parIti#|̍ jAqtavEdAq̍ iti# jAqta - vEdAqH| | tRutIya̱m| aPsvityap̍ - su| nRumaṇAq iti# nRu - manA̱H| ajasram|̍ indhAnaH|̍ Enam| jaratE| svAqdhIriti# sva - dhIH| | śuciH|̍ pAqvaka| vandyaH|̍ agnE̱| bRuhat| vIti|̍ rOcasE| | tvam| GRutEBiH|̍ Ahuta̍ ityA - hutaH| | dRuśAqnaH| rukmaH| urvyA| vIti|̍ adyaut| durmaṛ śhamiti# duH - maṛ śha̱m| AyuH|̍ śriyE| rucAqnaH| | agniH| amRutaH|̍ aBavat| vayOBiriti̍ vayaH̍ - BiH| 28 (50)
verses.samhita: rakśhatAdimaM|̍ tasmai# tE pratiharyatE̍ jAtavEdO̍ vicaṛ̍ śhaṇE| agnE janAmi̍ suśhTutiM| | divaspari# prathamaM jajñE̍ agnirasmad dvitIyaM pari# jAqtavEdAH|̍ tRutIyamaPsu̍ nRumaṇAq ajasramindhA̍na̍ EnaM jaratE svAqdhIH| | śuciH̍ pAvaka vandyO&gnE# bRuhadvi rOcasE|̍ tvaM GRutEBirAhutaH|̍ | dRuśAqnO rukma urvyA vyadyaud-durmaṛ̍ śhamAyuH̍ śriyE rucAqnaH|̍ agniramRutO# aBavadvayOBir̍ - [ ] 28

verses.padam: - Padam yat| Enam| dyauH| ajanayat|̍ surEtAq iti# su - rEtA̱H| | Eti|̍ yat| iśhE| nRupatimiti# nRu - pati̱m| tEjaH|̍ AnaT|̍ śuci|̍ rEtaH|̍ niśhiktamiti̍ ni - siktam| dyauH| aBIkE̱| | agniH| śardha̱m| anavadyam| yuvAnam|̍ svAqdhiyamiti# sva - dhiya̱m| janayat| sUdayat|̍ ca| | saH| tEjIyasA|̍ manasA|̍ tvOtaH|̍ uta| śikśha| svapatyasyEti# su - apatyasya|̍ śikśhOH| | agnE̱| rAqyaH| nRutamasyEti̍ nRu - tamasya| praBUtAqviti̍ pra - BUtau| BUyAma|̍ tE| suśhTutaya iti# su - stutayaH|̍ ca| vasvaH|̍ | agnE̱| sahantam|̍ Eti|̍ Bara| dyumnasya|̍ prAqsahEti# pra - sahA̱| rayim| | viśvA̱H| yaH| 29 (50)
verses.samhita: yadEnaM̍ dyaurajanayath̍ surEtA̱H| | A yadiśhE nRupatiM tEja AnaTCuci rEtO niśhiktaM̍ dyauraBIkE̱| agniH śarddhamanavadyaM̍ ~MyuvAnaṅ̍ svAqdhiyaM̍ janayath sUdayacca|̍ | sa tEjIyasAq̍ manasAq̍ tvOta# uta śikśha̍ svapatyasya# śikśhOH| agnE# rAqyO nRutamasya̍ praBUtau̍ BUyAma# tE suśhTutayaśca̍ vasvaH|̍ | agnE sahantamA̍ Bara̍ dyumnasya# prAqsahA# rayiM| viśvAq ya - [ ] 29

verses.padam: - Padam carq. śhaṇIH| aBIti|̍ AqsA| vAjEśhu|̍ sAqsahat|̍ | tam| agnE| pRutanAqsahamiti# pRutanA - saha̱m| rayim| sahasvaH| Eti|̍ Bara| | tvam| hi| satyaH| adButaH|̍ dAqtA| vAjasya|̍ gOmata̍ iti gO - mataH| | ukśhAnnAqyEtyukśha - annAqya| vaśAnnAqyEti# vaśA - annAqya| sOmapRuśhThAqyEti̍ sOma# - pRuśhThAqya| vEdhasE̱| | stOmai̱H| vidhEma| agnayE̱| | vadmA| hi| sUnO iti|̍ asi|̍ admasadvEtyadma̍ - sadvA̱| cakrE| agniH| januśhA̱| ajma|̍ anna̱m| | saH| tvam| naH| Urjasana ityu̱rja - sanE| Urja̱m| dhAqH| rAjA̱| iva| jEH| avRukE| kśhEśhi| antaH| | agnE̱| AyUṃśhi|̍ 30 (50)
verses.samhita: ścarq.̍ śhaṇIraByAsA̍ vAjEśhu̍ sAqsahat|̍ | tamagnE̍ pRutanAqsahaṃ# rayiṃ sahasva̍ A Bara|̍ tvaṃ hi satyO adButO̍ dAqtA vAjasya̍ gOmataH|̍ | ukśhAnnAya̍ vaśAnnAya̍ sOmapRuśhThAya̍ vEdhasE̱| stOmai̱r vidhEmAq&gnayE̱| | vadmA hi sUnO̍ asyadmasadvA̍# cakrE agnir januśhA &jmA&nna̱M| sa tvaM na# Urjasana UrjaM̍ dhAq rAjEva̍ jEravRukE kśhE̱śhyantaH| | agna AyUṃśhi̍ - [ ] 30

verses.padam: - Padam pavasE| Eti|̍ suva| Urja̱m| iśha̱m| ca| naH| | AqrE| bAqdhasva| ducCunA̱m| | agnE̱| pavasva|̍ svapAq iti# su - apA̱H| asmE iti|̍ varcaH|̍ suvIryamiti# su - vIrya̱m| | dadhat|̍ pOśha̱m| rayim| mayi|̍ | agnE̱| pAqvaka| rOciśhA̱| mandrayA̱| dEva| jihvayA̱| | Eti|̍ dEvAn| vakśhi| yakśhi|̍ ca| | saH| naH| pAqvaka| dIdivaH| agnE̱| dEvAn| iha| Eti|̍ vaha| | upEti|̍ yajñam| haviH| ca| naH| | agniH| śucivratatama̍ iti śucivrata̍ - tamaH| śuciH|̍ vipraH|̍ śuciH̍ ( )| kaviH| | śuciH|̍ rOcatE| Ahuta̍ ityA - hutaH| | uditi|̍ agnE| śucayaH|̍ tava|̍ śukrAH| BrAjantaH|̍ IratE| | tava|̍ jyOtIṃśhi|̍ arcayaH|̍ | 31 (64) (puruniśhThaH - purvaṇIka̍ - BarAq - &Bi - vayOBi̍ - rya - Ayuṃśhi̍ - vipraH śuci - ścaturdaśa̍ ca) (A14) Prasna Korvai with starting Padams of 1 to 14 Anuvaakams : - (dEvasya# - rakśhOhaṇO# - viBU - stvaṃ sOmA - &tyanyAnagA̱M - pRuthivyA - iśhE tvA - &&dadE̍ vAkta - saMtE# - samudraṃ - haviśhmatI̍ - rhRudE - tvamagnErudra̍ - ścaturdaśa|̍ ) Korvai with starting Padams of 1, 11, 21 śeries Of Pancaatis : - (dEvasya# - gamadhyE# - haviśhmatIH̍ - pavasa - Ekatriṃśat|̍ ) First and Last Padam of Third Prasnam: - (dEvasyAq - &rcayaH)|̍ | hariH̍ OM| | | | kRuśhṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM pada pAThE prathamakAṇDE tRutIyaH praśnaH samAptaH| |
verses.samhita: pavasa A suvOrjamiśhaM̍ ca naH| AqrE bAdhasva̍ ducCunA̱M| | agnE pavasva̍ svapA# asmE varcaH̍ suvIrya̱M| dadhatpOśhaṃ# rayiM mayi|̍ | agnE# pAvaka rOciśhA# mandrayA# dEva jihvayA̱| A dEvAn. vakśhi̍ yakśhi# ca| | sa naH̍ pAvaka dIdivO&gnE# dEvAṃ ihA vaha|̍ upa# yajñaṃ haviśca# naH| | agniH śucivratatamaH̍ śucir vipraH śuciH̍ ( ) kaviH| śucI# rOcata AhutaH|̍ | udagnE̍ śucayastava̍# śukrA BrAjanta̍ IratE| tava jyOtIṅśhyarcaya̍H|̍ | 31 (puruniśhThaH-purvaṇIka-BarAq-&Bi-vayO̍Bir-ya-AyUṃ̍śhi̍ - vipraH śuci-ścaturdaśa̍ ca) (A14) praśna korvai with starting padams of 1 to 14 anuvAkams :- (dEvasya-rakśhOhaṇO̍# -viBU-stvaṃ sOmA- &tyanyAnagA̱M - pRuthivyA -iśhE tvA - &&dadE̍ - vAkta-santE-̍ samudraṃ- haviśhmatIṛ̍ -hRudE- tvamagnE̍ rudra-ścaturdaśa̍ ) korvai with starting padams of 1, 11, 21 series of pa~jcAtis :- (dEvasya-gamadhyE̍-haviśhma̍tIH-pavasa-Eka̍triṃśat)̍ first and last padam of third praśnam:- (dEvasyAq-rcayaH̍ )| | hariH̍ OM| | | | kRuśhṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM prathamakAṇDE tRutIyaH praśnaH samAptaH| | OM namaH paramAtmanE, śrI mahAgaṇapatayE namaH, śrI guruByO namaH| hariH OM| | 1. 4 prathamakAṇDE caturtthaH praśnaH-(sutyAdinE kartavyA grahAH)
